comprehensive_overview: Intel Integrated Performance Primitives (Intel IPP) for IA-32 architecture is a software library that provides a comprehensive set of high-performance functions for building advanced applications in various domains. It offers optimized routines for signal and data processing, image processing, cryptography, and more.
core_features:
1. Optimized routines for signal and data processing.
2. High-performance functions for image processing.
3. Cryptography functions for secure data handling.
4. Support for various domains and applications.
5. Platform-specific optimizations for IA-32 architecture.
